testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.19 [Need to Share Section Timing Patterns] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Section Timing Pattern Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.15.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Section Timing Pattern Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.15.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N104R1143_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N104R1143_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1149_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1149_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1150_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1150_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1151_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1151_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1152_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1152_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1153_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1153_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Red Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1154_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1154_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1155_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1155_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pedestrian Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1156_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1156_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Steady-dont-walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1157_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1157_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Sequence Information - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1158_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1158_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Timing Pattern Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1159_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1159_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 25 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 26 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 26.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 26.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 26.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 26.1.2.1 VERIFY that a sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 26.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.3 VERIFY that a section-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.4 VERIFY that a section-timing-pattern-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.5 VERIFY that a section-cycle-length data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item

Step 26.1.2.6 VERIFY that an intersection-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 26.1.2.7 VERIFY that a cycle-length data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 26.1.2.8 VERIFY that an offset-time data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 26.1.2.9 VERIFY that a phase-identifier data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 26.1.2.10 VERIFY that a coordinated-phase data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 26.1.2.11 VERIFY that a split-mode data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 26.1.2.12 VERIFY that a phase-split data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N104R1149_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N104R1150_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a section-timing-pattern-name data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N104R1151_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a maximum-green-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N104R1152_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a minimum-green-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N104R1153_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-clearance-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N104R1154_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-red-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N104R1155_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a minimum-walk-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N104R1156_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that a pedestrian-clearance-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N104R1157_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a steady-dont-walk-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 26.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N104R1158_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 26.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that a sequence-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing
Step 26.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N104R1159_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 26.1.2.24 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 26.1.2.25 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 26.1.2.26 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 27 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 27.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 27.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 27.7 IF TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 28 EXIT
